      • addStoreVariableIfAbsent

        protected final String addStoreVariableIfAbsent(String expression)
        If store identifier variable is not supplied in functions relatedRequestExists and getRequestMessageFieldValue will add 'storeFMM' which will be resolved to the corresponding CRE Message Store. Which is default store.
        Parameters:
        expression - - string expression
        Returns:
        expression with added stores identifier
